name: Ten Best Sitcoms Ever Quiz | Mixture: Comedy | 10 Questions

questions.text: MASH. Which MASH regular was not a part of the attempted spinoff, 'Aftermash'?
questions.explanation:
Loretta Swit.

	Funny, Clever, dramatic, well-acted and well-written. Exceptional.

questions.text: Cheers. Ted Danson returned to TV in 'Becker'. He plays a ...?
questions.explanation:
Doctor.

	The magic was there for quite a while - and it was considerable.

questions.text: Honeymooners. When Gleason revived the series, who played Alice Kramden?
questions.explanation:
Sheila Macrae.

	Ralph Kramden was great. What mannerisms!

questions.text: Frasier. Much has been written about the real-life dramatic past of which one of the actors?
questions.explanation:
Kelsey Grammer.

	Superb writing and acting.

questions.text: Odd Couple. Klugman returned to TV with Quincy; what tv series did Randall try?
questions.explanation:
Love, Sidney.

	They were great together.

questions.text: Dick Van Dyke. The creative force behind the show was:
questions.explanation:
Carl Reiner.

	Great collection of characters in good stories.

questions.text: Three's Company. The follow-up, 'Three's a Crowd' featured which two actors as the parents of Jack's girl friend?
questions.explanation:
Robert Mandan and Jessica Walter.

	Clever and well-done, especially by Ritter.

questions.text: Mary Tyler Moore. The original premise for the series - which was rejected - called for Mary to play a woman who was ... ?
Seinfeld. One of the cast members was married to which comedienne?
questions.explanation:
Anne Meara.

	I really enjoyed the way seemingly disparate sub-plots ultimately came together. (It was Jerry Stiller)

questions.text: I Love Lucy. After the marriage to Desi Arnaz ended, who did Lucy eventually marry?
questions.explanation:
Gary Morton.

	She was a talented lady.
